name: Tech Disorder
description: "Tech Disorder" plunges players into a cyberpunk dystopia, blending Turn-based strategy, Roguelike chaos, and Deckbuilding complexity. In this game, you navigate a neon-lit world on the brink of technological collapse, where every decision shapes your journey. Customize your strategy with a dynamic deck of cybernetic enhancements, battle against cyber-enhanced foes and robots in strategic turn-based combat. "Tech Disorder" offers a relentless test of adaptability and tactical genius, set against a backdrop of stunning sci-fi visuals and a pulsing synth soundtrack. Embrace the disorder, redefine the future.
